A believer (Mu?min) or a Muslim is he who believes in:%0D%0A%0D%0Aa) The existence of Allah, the Almighty.%0D%0A%0D%0Ab) The Oneness of Allah and there is no partner to Alah.%0D%0A%0D%0Ac) The qualities of Allah ? being All-Knowing, All-hearing, Most-Powerful, etc.%0D%0A%0D%0Ad) The coming of all the prophets, including Musa (Alayhis salaam) and Eesa (Alayhis salaam).%0D%0A%0D%0Ae) The finality of the prophethood of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).%0D%0A%0D%0Af) The Qur?aan being Divinely revealed and the word of Allah.%0D%0A%0D%0Ag) Ahaadith ? the teaching of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) which in essence is also an explanation of the Qur?aan.%0D%0A%0D%0Ah) The angels.%0D%0A%0D%0Ai) Life after death and accountability in the court of Allah.%0D%0A%0D%0Aj) Jannat (paradise) and Jahannum (hell).%0D%0A%0D%0AThe above ten points are briefly the Aqaaid (beliefs) of a Mu?min.
